name: 守护传说
description:
Summary
The story begins in a quiet small village, 'wind' and parents originally quiet life is here, but to prevent demon resurrection, he resolutely set foot on the road that destroys demon crystal, get acquainted with partner all the way, experience all sorts of adventure, destroy demon crystal finally and harvested an accident...

Features
Q version of characters, lovely nostalgic painting style scene, let a person feel like in the fairy tale world;
Easy plot, humorous dialogue, let you fully engaged, temporarily transferred to another world, get relaxed;
The content is full and complete. The seven scenes include villages, fields, towns, caves, islands, castles and forests, allowing you to experience the fun of riding in these scenes and adventure. In addition, you can also experience the fun of catching fish.
Traditional turn-based RPG, horizontal battle;
Operating support mouse, keyboard and handle;
